body_html: I think this problem should be fixed now. Specifically, in ExponentialMovingAverage, zero_debias=False by default. If you'd like to experience improved accuracy at the cost of breaking backwards compatibility with old checkpoints, set zero_bias=True.
body_text: I think this problem should be fixed now. Specifically, in ExponentialMovingAverage, zero_debias=False by default. If you'd like to experience improved accuracy at the cost of breaking backwards compatibility with old checkpoints, set zero_bias=True.
body: I think this problem should be fixed now. Specifically, in `ExponentialMovingAverage`, `zero_debias=False` by default. If you'd like to experience improved accuracy at the cost of breaking backwards compatibility with old checkpoints, set `zero_bias=True`.
